mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) as acount,c.Commodity_no as Commodity_no,c.introduce as introduce,o.listprice as listprice FROM orderitem o,Commodity c WHERE o.Commodity_no=c.Commodity_no GROUP BY c.Commodity_no ORDER BY count(*) DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS acount,c.Commodity_no AS Commodity_no,c.introduce AS introduce,o.listprice AS listprice FROM orderitem o,Commodity c WHERE o.Commodity_no=c.Commodity_no GROUP BY c.Commodity_no HAVING c.Commodity_no IN (SELECT c.Commodity_no AS Commodity_no FROM Commodity c ,orderitem o ,Commodity_store c1 ,store s WHERE c1.store_no=s.store_no AND c.Commodity_no=o.Commodity_no AND c.Commodity_no=c1.Commodity_no
and s.storename=#{storename}
and s.starttime < STR_TO_DATE( #{starttime} , '%k:%i:%s')
and s.closetime > STR_TO_DATE( #{closetime} , '%k:%i:%s')
and c.Commodity_no like "%"#{selectInfo}"%"
GROUP BY c.Commodity_no) ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) as acount,c.Commodity_no,c.name,c.introduce FROM Commodity c,browse b WHERE c.Commodity_no=b.Commodity_no GROUP BY c.Commodity_no having c.Commodity_no in(SELECT c.Commodity_no FROM Commodity c ,browse b ,Commodity_store c1 ,store s WHERE c1.store_no=s.store_no AND c.Commodity_no=b.Commodity_no AND c.Commodity_no=c1.Commodity_no
and s.storename=#{storename}
and s.starttime < STR_TO_DATE( #{starttime} , '%k:%i:%s')
and s.closetime > STR_TO_DATE( #{closetime} , '%k:%i:%s')
and c.Commodity_no like "%"#{selectInfo}"%"
GROUP BY c.Commodity_no) ORDER BY count(*) DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) as acount,c.Commodity_no,c.name,c.introduce FROM Commodity c,browse b WHERE c.Commodity_no=b.Commodity_no GROUP BY c.Commodity_no ORDER BY count(*) DESC
